amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce National Nuclear Security Administration-Weapon Activities by $100 million and prohibit the use of funds, in excess of $120,253,000 to be used for the W80-4 Life Extension Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29, printed in the Congressional Record to reduce National Nuclear Security Administration-Weapons Activities by $100 million and prohibit the use of funds, in excess of $120,253,000 to be used for the W80-4 Life Extension Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A037) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
